official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Resolin Red F3BS Components I and II.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31,1992, the duty on N-(2-((2,6-dicyano-4-methylphenyl) azo)-5-(diethylamino) phenyl)-methanesulfonamide and N-(2-(2,6-dicyano-4-methylphenyl)azo)-5- (di-l-propylamino) phenyl)-methanesulfonamide.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Resolin Red F3BS Components I and II.
